ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 552
ygData.msgSnippet: hell bypass addicting the kids adopt me so I can play all the time and eat your food hell I will even go to school college that is if you pay for it :P ...
ygData.messageBody:
hell
bypass addicting the kids
adopt me
so I can play all the time
and eat your food
hell I will even go to school
college that is
if you pay for it :P

>
> Kat
